Name: 11 Islands 2: Story of Love
About the game: Play the sequel of the charming Match3 game '11 Islands'... A sinister fog has enveloped the islands and an ancient evil now threatens the lives of the local tribe! The tribe’s shaman and ship captain must team up to fight back and save the island’s inhabitants. Follow this unlikely pair, help them overcome incredible dangers, and see a budding relationship form in this tropical match-making adventure! - 100 levels – follow a captivating love story - Several bonusses and power ups - 30 island upgrades and fillable boosters - Modes - Moves, Countdown, and Relaxed
